Instruction

  • Start The Game, Click the Start Button
    • <<<<<<< HEAD
  • press the "I" button on keyboard to move the snake up,
  • the "J" button to move left
  • the "K" button to move Right and
  • the "M" button to move Down
    • =======
  • Click the Scramble button to shuffle the pictures.
  • If you want to change other picture, Click new Images.

Simple Snake Game

=======
  • For Finishing the puzzle
  • click the one of part pictures to move.
  • Arrange the picture until it
    becomes the whole picture, after that
  • you can get your score.
